overview: Ever dabbled in the cutthroat world of high finance? Well, fear not, that well-rounded English rose Nici Sterling is here to educate you. She's called back home to take care of her family's massive oil business, when 'Daddy' has a stroke! Left to her devices, she uncloaks a veritable hotbed of passion! From the bedroom to the boardroom - everyone wants a piece of her pie. So find out what it takes to make A WOMAN OF MEANS back down, and be sure to wear your poker face.
title: A Woman of Means
